```{r}
Sys.setenv(LANG = "en")
library(dplyr)
library(multiverse)
library(mverse)
```

```{r}
mv <- create_multiverse(soccer)
f <- formula_branch(height ~ meanIAT + weight, height ~ weight)
add_formula_branch(mv, f)
lm_mverse(mv)
summary(mv, output="df")
summary(mv, output="r")
```

```{r}
glm_mverse(mv, family=poisson())
summary(mv, output='de')
summary(mv, output='df')
summary(mv, output='aic')
summary(mv)
```

``` {r}
ttest_mverse(mv, x='height')
```
